overview: We wake up in Paris, at the end of 2013, and immerse ourselves in a symbolic journey, through a subjective nature, which directly experiences reality, without analyzing it. Abolition of thought to be replaced by consciousness and unconsciousness. Intuitive Scan Through the variations of the sound and alterations of the image, we experience the transience and mutability of the meaning and formal perception of it. It is about penetrating directly into the object itself, and seeing it from within. In this case, the cups of eucalyptus, of which we see his life vibrating within itself. Each moving image, in a unique way, has its own communicability, and there is communion between isolated acts.
